issue.title: [Rust] Support casting temporal arrays in cast kernels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4806](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4806). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
[ARROW-3882] is too far in the review process to add temporal casts.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4806?focusedCommentId=16793286) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
I'll submit a PR for this after ARROW-4865 so I don't create merge conflicts. So this should still be possible for 0.13 release

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4806?focusedCommentId=16839644) by Chao Sun (csun):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4150
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4150>
